title: Perform Oil Analysis
description: As part of a predictive maintenance program, an oil sample has been taken from a large gearbox. The sample needs to be analyzed for wear metals.

tasks.description: Log the oil sample in the lab system, linking it to the specific gearbox asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new sample record.

tasks.description: Perform the oil analysis using an ICP spectrometer to measure the concentration of various metals (e.g., iron, copper).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst performs the test and gets the results.

tasks.description: Compare the results to the alarm limits for this type of asset. The iron level is high, indicating accelerated wear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the results to limits and identifies a high iron level, triggering an alert for the reliability engineer.
